message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique and valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer. I believe this price is still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $650000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
